programme.title: Kenny Rogers as the Gambler
programme.desc: An Old West poker player (Kenny Rogers) acquires a sidekick (Bruce Boxleitner) and sets out to help the son he never knew.

programme.title: The Gambler II
programme.desc: Brady Hawkes, Billy Montana and Jeremiah Hawkes are on a train bound for a huge gambling event when the train is taken over by a gang of vicious killers in search of money.

programme.title: The Gambler II
programme.desc: Brady Hawkes, Billy Montana and Jeremiah Hawkes are on a train bound for a huge gambling event when the train is taken over by a gang of vicious killers in search of money.

programme.title: Texas City
programme.desc: Army gold shipments are being robbed and some insider is tipping off the outlaws as to the time and route. Johnny Mack Brown is called in and he teams up with Jim Kirby, an ex Army Officer who was kicked out when his shipment was robbed.

programme.title: Man From the Black Hills
programme.desc: Jim Fallon is summoned to Rim Rock by Hugh Delaney, an uncle he has not seen in years. Delaney wants to inform Jim that he has located Jim's elderly father, Pop Fallon, and that a young impostor has established himself as Pop's son.

programme.title: Randy Rides Alone
programme.desc: Government agent Randy Bowers (John Wayne) is accused of shooting up a saloon and has to escape from the jail to find the man behind the murders.

programme.title: The Star Packer
programme.desc: Marshal John Travers investigates the murder of a town's sheriff, makes it his mission to restore order to the town and bring down a bandit called the Shadow.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A disabled New Orleans police inspector (Lloyd Nolan) comes to arrest Ben on a 20-year-old murder charge.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam is taken hostage by a band of U.S. Army prisoners who have escaped and sought refuge on the Ponderosa.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: When a number of women are murdered under the same circumstances in a small Arizona town, Travis and Rynning are sent to investigate.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: When the daughter of the commander of an army post is kidnapped, Rynning, Travis and two undercover Army officers are sent to find her and set her free.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: Captain Rynning and several of his Rangers join a posse to smoke out the remnants of Luke Baxter's gang. The outlaws momentarily give the posse the slip and double back.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Rube Burrows becomes infamous through the south for train robbery but his girlfriend is portrayed as the brains; Margaret ingratiates herself with the outlaws leading to a deadly showdown.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: A former deputy and his gang terrorize a town with the help of a corrupt sheriff.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Kit and El Toro fight a bank robber and his gang.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: An artist is wounded and has his winning national lottery ticket stolen.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Trigger Dawson and his gang kidnap a young girl for ransom.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Kit investigates crooked horse-racing.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Kit (Bill Williams) is sent to investigate a series of postal holdups.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Kit and El Toro are sent to California to deal with land sharks.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: El Toro's uncle quarrels with the Hernandez clan; Kit proves the integrity of a will.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Outlaw Blake Conover leaves free territory to protect his wife and son.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Kit and El Toro (Bill Williams, Don Diamond) are ambushed by three gunmen.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Trappers are stealing food meant to carry the Indians through the winter.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: On their way to Fort Hazard, Kit and El Toro are robbed of their horses.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Outlaw Curly-Haired Kid escapes from prison and vows to kill Kit.

programme.title: Whistling Hills
programme.desc: A gunman is hired by stageline owner Chet Norman to stop a series of stagecoach holdups that always take place when the driver, Pete, sees a mystery rider and hears the weird notes of a silver whistle.

programme.title: Lawless Cowboys
programme.desc: A cowboy enlists the aid of an honest bronco buster and a local newspaperman to uncover a rodeo-fixing scheme.

programme.title: The Trail Beyond
programme.desc: Rod Drew (John Wayne) is asked to search for missing people in Canada, and quickly finds out a gang of French Canadian outlaws have been kidnapping people.

programme.title: West of the Divide
programme.desc: Ted and Dusty infiltrate a band of outlaws to get close to Mr. Gentry, the man who murdered Ted's father.

programme.title: The Kid
programme.desc: On the run in the American Southwest, a boy encounters the infamous outlaw Billy the Kid and the legendary lawman Pat Garrett. He soon finds himself caught in the crossfire as Billy and Garrett square off in a deadly game of cat and mouse.
